TextBlock.Text: 281,042 YEARS AGO: No user commands received for 10 minutes. All systems entering sleep.
<TimeMinutes> MINUTES, <TimeSeconds> SECONDS AGO: Increased solar activity detected. <color=orange>Sun Station</color> hull integrity approaching critical levels. Closing emergency doors.
Ascending to higher orbit. Maximum altitude reached. Further ascension prohibited by <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color>.
